Submit News Request

Trigger a new blockchain request to fetch the latest news articles.

How it works:

  1. Click "Send Request" to initiate a Chainlink Functions request.
  2. Approve the transaction in your MetaMask wallet.
  3. The Chainlink node will execute code to fetch and store news on-chain.
  4. Articles will appear on the homepage once processed.
×

Owner Control Panel

These functions are only available to the contract owner.

Chainlink Functions

Manually trigger the Chainlink Functions request to process data.

Note: This function:
  • Calls the sendRequest() function from your contract
  • Executes JavaScript code in a Chainlink DON
  • Requires an active Chainlink Functions subscription with LINK
